title: problem with Hextech
body:
Hi there, 
When im trying to "Force Repatch" through the repair tool Hextech it says right away. 
"Chromium Embedded Framework (CEF) Client application stopped working".
did any1 know something about it?

Thanks.

replies.body: CEF not working correctly is probably due to some incorrect permissions settings. Make sure that you're trying to run the HRT as administrator by right clicking on it and then choosing the admin option. Let me know if you still can't get it running!
Didn't work but considering the last person made the same post 4 months ago I assume ya'll just don't care. Overwatch here I come
Uncheck the Logs it will work

I'm having the same problems even after I run as admin, and when I hit start to run League it tells me "The problem can't start because zlib.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix the problem." I've reinstalled it and it keeps giving me the same feedback. Please help and thank you.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=LEpwOLxb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-26T23:49:26.575+0000)
>
> CEF not working correctly is probably due to some incorrect permissions settings. Make sure that you're trying to run the HRT as administrator by right clicking on it and then choosing the admin option. Let me know if you still can't get it running!

Worked for me thanks!

Wow thanks for the quick reply i appreciate it.
i dont have that option to right click and choose admin but i did went to Properties then  "Run as Administrator" under the Compatibility tab.
is it okay,or am I missing something?
its still the same with the CEF not working.

and another thing i just delete the folder "lol_patcher" i thought it might help but nothing.
My problem is basically that im just having problem DL the 13G patch it just redownloading it 31% or 50% then go back to 0%.
im losing my mind i dont know what to do anymore i did everything,accept buying new computer lol.
please help me out :)
MAYBE IF I KNOW THAT IS IT HEXTEXCH WILL WORK :D
i have the same problem someone help?
Had the same problem. When I uncheck "gather system and lol logs" it does work. Strange.
